api_key.title: BambooHR API Key
api_key.description: BambooHR API Key. Create by going to https://{{domain}}.bamboohr.com/settings/permissions/api.php

departments.title: Departments
departments.description: List of departments to fetch employees from. If empty, all employees will be fetched.

additional_fields.title: Additional Fields
additional_fields.description: List of additional employee field names to fetch. Each field name must have an alias. See https://documentation.bamboohr.com/reference/metadata-get-a-list-of-fields.
